explanation.text:
Explanation
A ''limited liability'' company means that in the event of folding up, the liabilities of the business are limited to the invested capital. This means that the personal properties and assets of the business owner cannot be used to settle the company's liabilities/debts.

text: A distinguishing characteristic of a limited liability company is that

options.text: is a collection of many sole proprietors

used by government to transport goods from one country to another

It relays and amplifies radio telecommunication signals via a transponder

subject: COMMERCE

explanation.text:
Explanation
Registered mail is a mail service that allows the sender of a mail to get an electronic verification about the package being sent or that a delivery attempt was made.
The sender gets a receipt when the item is mailed, and the receiver must sign to confirm that it was indeed received.
It is one of the most secure ways of sending packages
With the registered mail, you are required to make a trip to the Post Office to drop off your package. This means you cannot deposit your package in a collection box.

text: The best mode of ensuring that items posted get to the named addresses is through
subject: COMMERCE

options.text: a principal and a third party

options.text: residents of a country travel within it
non-residents of a country travel to other countries
residents of a country travel to other countries
non-residents of a country travel within it

subject: COMMERCE

A del credere agency is a type of principal-agent relationship wherein the del credere (agent) for an extra commission, acts not only as a salesperson, or broker, for the principal, but also as a guarantor of credit extended to the buyer.
The del credere agent stands in as a guarantor for the buyer who is buying the goods on credit, and in return, gets paid an extra commission by the buyer

subject: COMMERCE

The average clause means that if the insurer discovers that the sum insured on your policy is less than the actual value of your contents or the rebuild cost of your property, then they can reduce their payout to you when you claim.
Claim amount = (Actual loss × Insured amount) / Value of goods or property at the date of loss.
Mr. P =  30,000 x 25,000 ÷ (100,000)
750,000,000 ÷ 100,000 = 7,500

The uberrimae fidei principle otherwise known as "utmost good faith'' is an insurance principle that requires an insured or the party to the insurance policy to be of a good standard and reveal all material facts that could influence the decision of the other party.

text: What insurance principle has Mr. R violated if he decides to overstate the actual value of his property?

A hire purchase benefits the seller in the sense that the level of patronage increases as more people will be willing to buy and pay in bits for a specified period of time.

text: Hire purchase is advantageous to the seller in that

options.text: it enhances high level of patronage

subject: COMMERCE

explanation.text:
Explanation
A proforma invoice is a preliminary bill or estimated invoice which is sent to a buyer by the seller, requesting payment from the committed buyer for goods or services before they are supplied. 
When a seller deals with a particular buyer repeatedly, over time, the seller may not necessarily need to send the proforma invoice for the transaction to take place.

text: A proforma invoice is not required when

options.text: quoting for the supply of good

explanation.text:
Explanation
The macro-environmental forces of a business are made up of economic factors, demographic forces, technological factors, natural and physical forces, political and legal forces, and social and cultural forces.
The economic factors may include costs such as wages, interest rates, governmental activity, laws, policies, and tax rates. It posed as a constraint to the business environment because it is beyond the control of the business.

text: The macro-environmental forces and trends which are a constraint on business operations are referred to as
subject: COMMERCE

explanation.text:
Explanation
The Standard Organisation of Nigeria (SON) is a statutory body that is created by the Nigerian government and tasked with the responsibility of standardizing and regulating the quality of all products in Nigeria. It means, the body carries out quality checks on all consumer products and those that do not pass the quality test are withdrawn from circulation.

text: Which of the following has power to order withdrawal of a particular food item from circulation?

options.text: Food and Drugs Department of the Federal Ministry of Health

subject: COMMERCE

explanation.text:
Explanation
In the law of contract, specific performance is the act whereby a court issues an order requiring a party to perform a specific action, such as to complete the performance of the contract.
Hauwa could easily sue Chibuzor for not keeping her own end of the agreement and compel her to deliver the dress as promised.

text: Chibuzor agreed to make a dress for Hauwa with September 20, 1995 as the delivery date, if the dress was not ready on that date, Hauwa could

options.text: seize another gown from chibuzor's shop
regard the contract between then as terminated

A merchant wholesaler is an institution that buys goods from manufacturers and resells them to businesses, government agencies, other wholesalers, or retailers.  All merchant wholesalers take title to the goods they sell.

text: The function of a merchant wholesaler is to

options.text: find markets for producers' finished goods
possess title to the goods, store and sell to retailers
buy in bulk, store and sell to retailers as desired

subject: COMMERCE
